title: Today's Meal in Marmara
subtitle: MEAL IN A DIFFERENT FORM
text: I wonder if today's meal is delicious or not. I have to check the school's website and... I wish it came as a notification.

imageAlt: a ship sailing on the sea
title: Rocky Journey
subtitle: AN FPGA GAME
text: A game written in Verilog HDL that runs on an FPGA. Drives an LED matrix and uses several hardware buttons for inputs.

title: Personal Website
subtitle: BUILT USING LATEST TECH
text: Open source website built using React. A lot of design work and an interactive CV built into it! I also streamed myself building it!
